alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 2:28PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Otero, southwestern Kiowa, and Crowley Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 227 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles north of Sugar City, or 33 miles north of La Junta, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Damaging winds could extend well ahead of thunderstorms. Locations impacted include... Rocky Ford, Fowler, Ordway, Manzanola, Olney Springs, Sugar City, Cheraw and Crowley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.
